text: Teutapi Tuhan kuasa that-that : Deungon sikeujap pih ek Neuubah £ Ek Neubri keu lon keubon nyang jroh that Leubeh bak hajat gata nyang mewah Lam keubon gata Neupeutron laknat Geulanteue kilat Neubri le Allah Abeh dum jitak kurma ngon ‘inab Bandum ka seungap anco ngon bicah Tanoh nyang geumbok bandum jeuet batat
